ActJudges Act
SubjectClaire Trudeau ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Yvon Jasmin **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to CLAIRE TRUDEAU, widow of the Hon. Yvon Jasmin, a Judge of the Superior Court of Quebec, effective May 10, 2013.
AttachmentsAttachment
